
Shivrajpur Chak is a village in the Gadchiroli district  with an area of 726.7 hectares, harbouring 306 households and with total population of 1113 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town is DESAIGANJ at a distance of 5-10 kms.

There are 2 Middle schools in the village
